#body: //div[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' article ')]//div[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' row ')]
body: //div[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' article ')]

date: //meta[@itemprop="datePublished"]/@content

strip_id_or_class: newsrelated
strip_id_or_class: news-single__categories

prune: no

test_url: https://typo3.org/article/frontend-editing-planning-the-next-major-version
